titles: Act condemning a pamphlet, called, An apologetick relation of suffering ministers. Edinburgh, the eighth day of February, one thousand six hundred and sixty six.
author: Scotland. Privy Council.
publisher: Printed by Evan Tyler, Printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty,
notes: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Signed at end: Pet. Wedderburne, Cl. Sti. Concilii.
Imperfect: stained with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
keywords: Brown, John, 1610?-1679. --  Apologeticall relation, of the particular sufferings of the faithfull ministers.
